trigger_event.details: Led by Accel with participation from Okta Ventures, Gradient Ventures, Menlo Ventures, Anthropic, and Coinbase Ventures

signals: CEO is former Shopify Director of Engineering (Payments)
Building financial layer for AI agents
pain_points: Investor reporting for new Accel-led round
Financial controls at seed→Series A transition
Cash flow management with new capital injection

decision_makers.name: Ilan Zerbib
decision_makers.title: CEO & Co-founder
decision_makers.background: Former Shopify Director of Engineering (Payments), 5 years

lead.outreach_angle: Hi Ilan, congrats on the Sapiom seed round! Building financial infrastructure for AI agents puts you at the intersection of fintech and AI - two sectors where financial operations complexity scales fast. I work with seed-stage B2B companies post-funding to set up investor reporting frameworks and financial controls before the Series A crunch.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection request to Ilan Zerbib within 48 hours while funding news is fresh

trigger_event.details: Led by CapitalG (Alphabet's growth fund), with Index Ventures participating

signals: Series A funding from top-tier growth fund
Stripe alumni founders (Duco van Lanschot, David Schreiber)
lead.outreach_angle: Hi Duco, congrats on the Duna Series A! Building a global trust infrastructure for business identity is ambitious - and with CapitalG's involvement, the reporting bar just got higher. I help Series A fintechs set up multi-entity financial operations and investor-grade reporting systems. Given your dual HQ setup, might be worth a brief chat.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection to Duco van Lanschot. Reference his Stripe background and KYB expertise.

trigger_event.details: Accel doubling down after pre-seed in 2024

signals: Enterprise customers including banks and healthcare providers
Founded 2023 (2 years old, hitting scaling phase)
Replaces agency-heavy model with AI agents
pain_points: Enterprise sales financial operations (long sales cycles)
SaaS metrics for Accel reporting (ARR, NRR, CAC/LTV)
Cash flow management with multi-year contracts
lead.outreach_angle: Hi Ankur, congrats on the Fibr AI seed extension! The shift from agency-driven personalization to autonomous AI agents is a massive opportunity - but enterprise sales cycles with banks and healthcare providers require tight financial operations. I work with Accel-backed startups to set up financial infrastructure that scales with enterprise growth.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection to Ankur Goyal. Reference the enterprise customer traction.

trigger_event.details: $1 billion valuation, led by Lightspeed Venture Partners

pain_points: Likely already have CFO given unicorn status

decision_makers.name: Spiros Xanthos
decision_makers.title: Co-founder
decision_makers.background: Former Splunk executive, founded Omnition (acquired by Splunk 2019)

lead.outreach_angle: Given unicorn valuation, likely have CFO in place. Lower priority unless CFO departure detected.
lead.recommended_action: Monitor for CFO changes. Skip for now.
